overview_of_class: This course connects macroscopic properties (342-1) to molecular properties (342-2). The topics include the Boltzmann distribution, partition functions, distribution functions, macroscopic properties, theories for kinetics, and experimental methods.
name: Kinetics and Statistical Thermodynamics
title: WCAS CHEM 342-3-01 Kinetics and Statistical Thermodynamics

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This course connects macroscopic properties (342-1) to molecular properties (342-2). The topics include the Boltzmann distribution, partition functions, distribution functions, macroscopic properties, theories for kinetics, and experimental methods.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value: 1. Physical Chemistry, Atkins, 9th Edition, Freeman Press

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Suggested)
descriptions.value: 1. Solutions Manual for Physical Chemistry, Atkins, 9th Edition, Freeman Press

subject: CHEM
